file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-47-00-05 - ANTICOLLISION LIGHTS - ADJUSTMENT/TEST

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL ANTICOLLISION LIGHTS - ADJUSTMENT/TEST EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the test of the Anticollision Lights. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ANTICOLLISION LIGHTS - OPERATIONAL ALL 33-47-00-700-801-A TEST EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-47-00 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-47-00-700-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ANTICOLLISION LIGHTS - OPERATIONAL TEST A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to do the Operational Test of the Anticollision Lights. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION ENERGIZATION OF THE AIRCRAFT WITH AN EX- AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200 TERNAL POWER SOURCE C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 254 Passenger cabin ceiling 192 Wing to fuselage fairing center panel 661 Right wing tip 321 Stabilizer tip 561 Left wing tip D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Energize the aircraft with the External DC Power Supply ( AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200). (2) On the Circuit Breakers Panel, make sure that the Circuit Breakers below are closed: – RED BEACON LIGHT (Location tip: DC BUS 2/LIGHTS/RED BEACON). – STROBE LIGHT (Location tip: DC BUS 1/ LIGHTS/STROBE). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 33-47-00 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Operationally Test Anticollision Lights (Figure 501) (Figure 502) SUBTASK 710-002-A (1) Do the test of the Anticollision Lights as follows: (a) Set the RED BCN light switch, on the overhead panel, to the ON position. Result: 1 The upper red strobe light, on the top of fuselage center section II, comes on. 2 The lower red strobe light, on the wing-to-fuselage fairing center panel, comes on. (b) Set the RED BCN light switch to the OFF position. Result: 1 The upper red strobe light goes off. 2 The lower red strobe light goes off. (c) Set the STROBE light switch, on the overhead panel, to the ON position. Result: 1 The left strobe light, on the left wing-tip fairing, comes on. 2 The right strobe light, on the right-wing tip fairing, comes on. 3 The rear strobe light, on the fin-tip fairing, comes on. (d) Set the STROBE light switch to the OFF position. Result: 1 The left strobe light goes off. 2 The right strobe light goes off. 3 The rear strobe light goes off. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Deenergize the aircraft ( AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 33-47-00 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A.
